name: CTRL-Z (Lynx Point Games)
description:
Arrow keys / WASD to move, space to interact with menu/textboxes.

Made for Weekly Game Jam #166, where the theme was "Roots"! This game incorporates the theme by involving pulling boxes and places coins onto their root (beginning). Admittedly the game has a bit of work to be done since I didn't have enough time to fully think out my concept and execute it properly, but if enough people find potential in this I could come back to this project!
